description: Canonical schema describing the structure of an authorization artifact. No authorization is implied by schema existence.

authorization_id.notes: Unique identifier; presence does not imply validity.

authorization_class.notes: Must correspond to Phase-Z authorization class taxonomy.

scope.notes: Explicit scope definition; absence or ambiguity results in denial.

issued_by.notes: Authorizing authority; must be traceable and auditable.

phase_y_mediation_reference.notes: Reference to Phase-Y policy decision artifact.

revocation_triggers.notes: Includes Phase-X halt, TTL expiry, policy violation.

global_invariants: Any missing field results in DENY
Phase-X halt revokes all authorizations immediately
Phase-Y mediation is mandatory for validity
